Package abstraction

Class Wall

java.lang.Object
abstraction.Wall
public class Wall extends Object
Represents a wall in a game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Wall(Orientation orientation, Position position)
    Constructs a new Wall object with the specified orientation and position.

    • Wall

      public Wall(Orientation orientation, Position position)
      Constructs a new Wall object with the specified orientation and position.
      Parameters:
      orientation - The orientation of the wall (horizontal or vertical).
      position - The position of the wall.

  • Method Details

    • getOrientation

      public Orientation getOrientation()
      Returns the orientation of the wall.
      Returns:
      The orientation of the wall.

    • setOrientation

      public void setOrientation(Orientation orientation)
      Sets the orientation of the wall.
      Parameters:
      orientation - The new orientation of the wall.

    • getPosition

      public Position getPosition()
      Returns the position of the wall.
      Returns:
      The position of the wall.

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(Position position)
      Sets the position of the wall.
      Parameters:
      position - The new position of the wall.

    • outOfBorderWidth

      public boolean outOfBorderWidth()
      Checks if the center of the wall is at the edge of the board, indicating that the wall is out of bounds.
      Returns:
      true if the wall is out of bounds, false otherwise.

    • hasWall

      public boolean hasWall(Board board)
      Verifies if there is an existing wall that will conflict with the new wall on the given board.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board.
      Returns:
      true if there is a wall conflict, false otherwise.

    • verifyWall

      public boolean verifyWall(Board board)
      Verifies if the wall can be placed on the given board by checking for conflicts and out of bounds.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board.
      Returns:
      true if the wall can be placed, false otherwise.

    • updateWall

      public void updateWall(Board board, Case type)
      Updates the state of the wall on the game board. Places or removes the wall from the board based on the given case type.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board.
      type - The case type to update the wall to (WALL or NULL).

    • wallError

      public boolean wallError(Board board, Player[] players, Integer turn)
      Verifies if the placed wall blocks a player and removes it if necessary.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board.
      players - Array of players in the game.
      turn - The current turn number.
      Returns:
      true if the wall blocked a player, false otherwise.

    • removeLastWall

      public static void removeLastWall(Board board)
      Removes the last wall placed.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board.

    • createWall

      public static boolean createWall(Board board, Player[] players, Integer turn, Orientation orientation, Position pos)
      Creates the wall and verifies if it blocks a player's winning path using depth-first search.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board.
      players - Array of players in the game.
      turn - The current turn number.
      orientation - The orientation of the wall (horizontal or vertical).
      pos - The position of the wall.
      Returns:
      true if the wall has been created, false otherwise.
